title: Display Property Not Taking Effect in New PDF Emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the expected behavior is for the corresponding label to disappear.
EB: In the PDF preview, the expected result is that the label should not be visible. However, the actual result is that the label remains visible.
SR:
1. Open the application and navigate to the PDF emitter feature.
2. Set the display property of any item to 'none'.
3. Generate a PDF preview.
4. Observe that the label associated with the item is still visible despite the 'none' display property.
